Bad Comments: Bad styling, editing, timing, and translations. Most TL notes were useless. Although I do appreciate that they subbed the series, I can't give a +.

I would love it if they learn to spell, how to do grammar and know the translations of a Japanese word.. Itadakimasu is not I won't stand on a ceremony, it means something like I am going to eat or Let's eat..
